title: MPH: The F1 force that could split Leclerc & Ferrari — and even McLaren
summary: Formula 1 history shows that success and failure alike can rupture partnerships. Could Ferrari and Leclerc be next?Mark Hugheswonders

qa_pairs.question: Which driver is currently associated with Ferrari in Formula 1?
What is a potential reason for partnerships in Formula 1 to end?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Lack of success or performance issues

qa_pairs.question: Which team is also mentioned in the context of possible splits alongside Ferrari?
